Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Suspends all unnecessary travel by government agencies, departments, boards, divisions, authorities, and commissions as long as Act 9 of 2021, SB 202, of Georgia is in effect
Summary: Suspends all unnecessary travel by government agencies, departments, boards, authorities, and commissions as long as Act 9 of 2021, SB 202, of Georgia is in effect.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to suspending all unnecessary travel to the state of Georgia so long as Act 9 of 2021, SB 202, as signed into law on March 25, 2021 in the state of Georgia is in effect; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
